title: Twisted Queen
description: When I’m ripped from safety, catapulted into consciousness, and thrown into a nightmare, I come face-to-face with the cruel plot twist fate threw me.My fight-or-flight instinct kicks in, and when every road leads to chaos, there’s only one option.In my darkest moments, I promised myself I’d take what I want.And that includes them.My dark avengers.Protective. Possessive. Mine.
author: Penelope Black
